name: MarsO
description:
MarsO

Small story about an engineer from neighbor city - Mars City, who was sended to capital of mars colony - City Zero, for search some electrical parts and circuits parts for repairs at home city!

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys / WASD

Interact - Z

Quest List - Enter
To close Quset list - press Z, X, Shift or Enter

Credits

Programming of GB Engine - Chris Maltby
Created with GB Studio

Graphics:
Chris Maltby
DarkPhotton
OpenGameArt

Story - Dark Photton
